leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 气候-数值模式与数据同化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 模式→同化→评估→后处理→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 模式组件 + 同化库 + 评测

queries: [WEB] physics informed machine learning weather github

tools.name: Pangu-Weather
tools.one_line_profile: Official implementation of the Pangu-Weather global weather forecasting model
tools.detailed_description: An official implementation of Pangu-Weather, a 3D high-resolution global weather forecasting model based on deep learning. It provides the model architecture and inference code for generating weather forecasts from reanalysis data.

tools.name: Super-Resolution-Neural-Operator
tools.one_line_profile: Neural operator framework for super-resolution of PDE solutions
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Super-Resolution Neural Operator (SRNO), a method designed to upscale low-resolution partial differential equation (PDE) solutions to high resolution, applicable in climate modeling and fluid dynamics.

tools.name: BENO
tools.one_line_profile: Boundary-Embedded Neural Operator for PDEs with complex geometries
tools.detailed_description: A Boundary-Embedded Neural Operator (BENO) designed to solve partial differential equations on complex geometries with inhomogeneous boundary conditions, improving accuracy near boundaries.

tools.name: LE-PDE-UQ
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification framework for deep learning-based PDE surrogates
tools.detailed_description: A framework that endows deep learning-based surrogate models with robust and efficient uncertainty quantification capabilities for both forward and inverse PDE problems.

tools.name: WDNO
tools.one_line_profile: Wavelet Diffusion Neural Operator for generative PDE simulation
tools.detailed_description: Wavelet Diffusion Neural Operator (WDNO) utilizes diffusion models within wavelet space to perform generative simulation and control of partial differential equations.

tools.name: ClimODE
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed Neural ODEs for climate and weather forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A climate and weather forecasting model that integrates physics-informed inductive biases using Neural Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) to model atmospheric dynamics.

tools.name: TopoPyScale
tools.one_line_profile: Climate downscaling library for hillslope scale applications
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to perform climate downscaling of atmospheric forcing data to the hillslope scale, accounting for topographic effects.

tools.name: FactFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Transformer for PDE surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of FactFormer, a factorized transformer architecture designed for scalable and efficient surrogate modeling of partial differential equations.

tools.name: EFDO
tools.one_line_profile: Neural operator for magnetotelluric data forward modeling
tools.detailed_description: A neural operator network (EFDO) designed for fast forward modeling of magnetotelluric data in complex media, facilitating geophysical exploration.

tools.name: pangu-weather-verify
tools.one_line_profile: Verification tool for Pangu-Weather model predictions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for validating the Pangu Weather Forecasting Model against real-world meteorological observations, aiding in model assessment and quality control.

tools.name: dodola
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow tool for CMIP6 bias-adjustment and downscaling
tools.detailed_description: A containerized application designed to run individual tasks within a larger orchestrated workflow for CMIP6 climate data bias-adjustment and downscaling.

tools.name: NowcastingGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based generative model for extreme precipitation nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Transformer-based generative model specifically designed for nowcasting extreme precipitation events.

tools.name: GPTCast
tools.one_line_profile: Generative pre-trained transformer for precipitation nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: A generative model based on GPT architecture adapted for precipitation nowcasting tasks.

tools.name: PyESD
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for Empirical Statistical Downscaling of climate data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for Empirical Statistical Downscaling (ESD) of climate variables (e.g., precipitation, temperature) using predictors from reanalysis datasets and machine learning transfer functions.

tools.name: DiffCast
tools.one_line_profile: Residual diffusion framework for precipitation nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: A unified framework utilizing residual diffusion models for high-fidelity precipitation nowcasting, as presented at CVPR 2024.

tools.name: Allen-Cahn-FNO
tools.one_line_profile: Fourier Neural Operators for solving Allen-Cahn equations
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Fourier Neural Operators specifically tailored to solve the Allen-Cahn partial differential equations, often used in phase-field modeling.

tools.name: CLT-material-properties
tools.one_line_profile: Calculator for composite laminate material properties
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate properties of composite laminate materials, including Young's modulus, stiffness matrix, and failure criteria application.

tools.name: OpenCastKit
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source toolkit for running AI weather models like FourCastNet and GraphCast
tools.detailed_description: An open-source solution providing implementations and workflows for state-of-the-art AI weather forecasting models, including FourCastNet and GraphCast, facilitating their use in research and production.

tools.name: SmaAt-UNet
tools.one_line_profile: Small Attentive U-Net architecture for precipitation nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of SmaAt-UNet, a deep learning model designed for efficient precipitation nowcasting using attention mechanisms within a U-Net structure.

tools.name: Pangu-Weather-ReadyToGo
tools.one_line_profile: Unofficial workflow for running Huawei's Pangu Weather Model
tools.detailed_description: A demonstration and workflow tool for the Pangu Weather Model, covering the entire process from input data preparation to forecasting and result visualization.

tools.name: Precipitation-Nowcasting (TrajGRU)
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of TrajGRU for precipitation nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: A widely used PyTorch implementation of the Trajectory GRU (TrajGRU) model for precipitation nowcasting, serving as a reference solver for this task.

tools.name: JAX-DIPS
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable interfacial PDE solver based on JAX
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based library for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) with interfaces, supporting differentiability for optimization and inverse problems.

tools.name: PinnDE
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for solving differential equations with PINNs and DeepONets
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to solve differential equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and Deep Operator Networks (DeepONets), facilitating physics-ML integration.

tools.name: fldgen
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for global climate fields consistent with ESM pathways
tools.detailed_description: An R package developed by JGCRI that generates random global climate fields consistent with a given global mean temperature pathway and spatial/temporal correlations from Earth System Models.

tools.name: NeurOLight
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operator-based simulation framework for photonic devices
tools.detailed_description: A simulation framework leveraging Neural Operators for modeling integrated photonic devices, enabling fast and accurate physics simulations.

tools.name: ConvLSTM-Pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Convolutional LSTM
tools.detailed_description: A reusable implementation of Convolutional LSTM in PyTorch, widely used for spatiotemporal forecasting tasks like precipitation nowcasting.

tools.name: KoopmanLab
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Koopman Neural Operators with PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for implementing and training Koopman Neural Operators, facilitating the modeling of dynamical systems.

tools.name: ldcast
tools.one_line_profile: Latent diffusion models for generative precipitation nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: A library by MeteoSwiss implementing latent diffusion models specifically for generative precipitation nowcasting, enabling high-resolution probabilistic forecasting.

tools.name: GARD
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized Analog Regression Downscaling tool
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool developed by NCAR for statistical downscaling of climate data using generalized analog regression techniques.

tools.name: ICAR
tools.one_line_profile: Intermediate Complexity Atmospheric Research model
tools.detailed_description: A simplified atmospheric model developed by NCAR that allows for computationally efficient downscaling and atmospheric research compared to full physics models.

tools.name: NVIDIA Modulus
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-ML framework for building and training physics-informed models
tools.detailed_description: An open-source deep learning framework by NVIDIA (formerly SimNet) for building, training, and fine-tuning physics-ML models, including PINNs and Neural Operators.

tools.name: FourCastNet
tools.one_line_profile: Global weather forecasting model using Fourier Neural Operators
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of FourCastNet, a data-driven global weather forecasting model that leverages Fourier Neural Operators for high-resolution predictions.

tools.name: FengWu-4DVar
tools.one_line_profile: 4DVar data assimilation integrated with large weather models
tools.detailed_description: A tool integrating the FengWu large weather model with 4DVar data assimilation techniques to improve global weather forecasting accuracy and initial condition estimation.

tools.name: DINOZAUR
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion multiplier and uncertainty quantification for FNOs
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the DINOZAUR method, providing a light-weight diffusion multiplier for uncertainty quantification in Fourier Neural Operators, developed by PhysicsX.

tools.name: MPP (Multiple Physics Pretraining)
tools.one_line_profile: Pretraining framework for physical surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A library for Multiple Physics Pretraining (MPP), enabling the training of foundation models across diverse physical systems to improve surrogate modeling performance.

tools.name: Constrained Downscaling
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-constrained deep learning for climate downscaling
tools.detailed_description: A framework for incorporating physical constraints into deep learning architectures for climate data downscaling and super-resolution tasks.

tools.name: downscaleR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for climate data bias correction and downscaling
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing tools for bias correction and statistical downscaling of climate data, part of the climate4R bundle.

tools.name: FluxNeuralOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operator library for Julia (Flux ecosystem)
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing DeepONets, Fourier Neural Operators, and Physics-Informed Neural Operators within the Flux ML ecosystem for solving PDEs.

tools.name: NeuralOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Neural Operator library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for training and evaluating neural operators, including FNOs and DeepONets, for solving partial differential equations.

tools.name: DGMR
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Generative Models of Radar for precipitation nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of DeepMind's DGMR model for skillful short-term precipitation nowcasting using radar data.

tools.name: WNO
tools.one_line_profile: Wavelet Neural Operator for parametric PDEs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Wavelet Neural Operator for solving parametric partial differential equations in computational mechanics.

tools.name: TSDB
tools.one_line_profile: Time Series Data Bean for loading public datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox that provides unified loading for 172 public time series datasets, including weather and environmental data, facilitating benchmarking and analysis.

tools.name: UniWeat
tools.one_line_profile: Unified Framework for Weather Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A unified deep learning framework designed for weather prediction tasks, supporting various models and datasets, developed by Westlake AI.

tools.name: Deep-DeePC
tools.one_line_profile: Data-enabled predictive control using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for learning the DeePC operator using neural networks to bypass online optimization in data-enabled predictive control, applicable to physical systems.

tools.name: continuiti
tools.one_line_profile: Library for learning function operators with neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for learning function operators using neural networks, facilitating the development of operator learning models for scientific computing tasks.

tools.name: ClimateLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for accessing climate data and benchmarking machine learning models
tools.detailed_description: A library that standardizes the process of accessing climate data, processing it, and benchmarking various machine learning models for weather and climate forecasting tasks.

tools.name: pyClim-SDM
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical Downscaling for Climate Change Projections with GUI
tools.detailed_description: A tool providing statistical downscaling methods for climate change projections, featuring a Graphical User Interface to facilitate usage by researchers.

tools.name: FourierFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for benchmarking Fourier Neural Operators
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to develop, train, and benchmark various Fourier Neural Operator architectures for solving partial differential equations.

tools.name: geo_neural_op
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Neural Operators for tasks on point-cloud representations
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Geometric Neural Operators (GNPs) for machine learning tasks on point-cloud representations, including solvers for geometric PDEs and curvature estimation.

tools.name: DDRP
tools.one_line_profile: Degree-Day, Risk, and Pest event mapping system
tools.detailed_description: A platform for predicting phenology and climate suitability of invasive species and pests, capable of using historical, real-time, or future downscaled climate data.

tools.name: climr
tools.one_line_profile: R package for downscaling monthly climate data for North America
tools.detailed_description: An R package developed by the BC Government for downscaling monthly climate data, facilitating high-resolution climate analysis for North America.

tools.name: cmip6-downscaling
tools.one_line_profile: Pipelines for downscaling CMIP6 climate data
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools and pipelines for performing statistical and dynamical downscaling on CMIP6 climate model outputs, developed by CarbonPlan.

tools.name: pde-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-constrained deep learning for surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A library for creating high-dimensional surrogate models using physics-constrained deep learning, enabling uncertainty quantification without labeled data.

tools.name: nircam_grism
tools.one_line_profile: Data processing codes for JWST NIRCam/WFSS Grism data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of codes and data tools for processing and analyzing Grism data from the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) NIRCam instrument, supporting astronomical research.

tools.name: FMI-PPN
tools.one_line_profile: Operational probabilistic precipitation nowcasting system
tools.detailed_description: The Finnish Meteorological Institute Probabilistic Precipitation Nowcasting system (FMI-PPN) is an operational software package for generating short-term precipitation forecasts.

tools.name: PreDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Precipitation nowcasting using Latent Diffusion Models
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of PreDiff, a model leveraging Latent Diffusion Models for high-resolution precipitation nowcasting, capable of generating probabilistic forecasts.

tools.name: U-FNO
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced Fourier Neural Operator for multiphase flow
tools.detailed_description: U-FNO is a deep learning model based on Fourier Neural Operators, optimized for simulating and predicting multiphase flow dynamics in porous media.

tools.name: ConvLSTM-2
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional LSTM implementation for precipitation nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: A widely used implementation of the Convolutional LSTM (ConvLSTM) architecture specifically tailored for precipitation nowcasting tasks.

tools.name: hippyflow
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate construction for parametric PDE maps
tools.detailed_description: A library for constructing dimension-reduced surrogates for parametric Partial Differential Equation (PDE) maps, part of the hippylib ecosystem for inverse problems.

tools.name: RainNet
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional neural network for radar-based precipitation nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model (CNN) designed for precipitation nowcasting using radar data, providing a robust baseline for weather prediction tasks.

tools.name: rainymotion
tools.one_line_profile: Optical flow library for radar-based precipitation nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various optical flow techniques for tracking and forecasting precipitation movement based on radar imagery.

tools.name: Weather4cast
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and toolkit for the IARAI Weather4cast Challenge
tools.detailed_description: The official codebase for the Weather4cast competition, providing data loaders, baseline models, and evaluation tools for high-resolution weather prediction.

tools.name: DLWP
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning Weather Prediction framework
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for building and training deep learning models for global weather prediction, supporting various data processing and modeling tasks.

tools.name: DLWP-CS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning Weather Prediction on Cubed Sphere
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the DLWP framework specifically designed for global weather prediction models operating on cubed-sphere grids.

tools.name: metnet3-pytorch (kyegomez)
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of MetNet-3 for weather forecasting
tools.detailed_description: An open-source implementation of Google DeepMind's MetNet-3 model, providing a neural network architecture for high-resolution precipitation nowcasting.

tools.name: WeatherLearn
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch-based Weather Deep Learning Model Zoo
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library providing implementations of various deep learning models for weather forecasting, facilitating benchmarking and research.

tools.name: metnet3-pytorch (lucidrains)
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality PyTorch implementation of MetNet-3
tools.detailed_description: A robust and reusable PyTorch implementation of the MetNet-3 neural weather model, designed for easy integration into weather forecasting pipelines.

tools.name: esd
tools.one_line_profile: Empirical-Statistical Downscaling tool for climate data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for climate and weather data analysis, empirical-statistical downscaling, and visualization, maintained by the Norwegian Meteorological Institute.

tools.name: ClimaX
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for weather and climate
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model for weather and climate science that can be fine-tuned for various downstream tasks such as forecasting and downscaling.

tools.name: climate_learn
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for climate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that standardizes data access, model training, and evaluation for applying deep learning to climate science problems.

tools.name: coordax
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based library for managing coordinate systems and fields in physics models
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to handle coordinate axes and fields for JAX-based physical simulations, serving as a foundational component for the NeuralGCM climate model.

tools.name: dinosaur
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable dynamical core for atmospheric modeling in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable dynamical core (dycore) implemented in JAX, designed for atmospheric modeling and serving as the physics backbone for NeuralGCM.

tools.name: NeuralGCM
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid machine learning and physics model for Earth's atmosphere
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art climate model that combines a differentiable physics-based dynamical core with machine learning components to simulate Earth's atmosphere efficiently.

tools.name: neuraloperator
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for training neural operators (FNO, DeepONet) for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A library for learning operators in infinite-dimensional spaces, providing implementations of Fourier Neural Operators (FNO) and other architectures for solving partial differential equations (PDEs).

tools.name: graph_weather
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of GraphCast and other graph-based weather models
tools.detailed_description: An open-source implementation of graph-based global weather forecasting models, including the architecture described in the 'Forecasting Global Weather with Graph Neural Networks' paper.

tools.name: metnet
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of MetNet and MetNet-2 for precipitation forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Google Research's MetNet family of models, designed for high-resolution precipitation nowcasting.

tools.name: ClimDown
tools.one_line_profile: R library for daily climate model downscaling
tools.detailed_description: A library provided by the Pacific Climate Impacts Consortium (PCIC) for statistical downscaling of daily climate model data, implementing methods like BCCAQ.

tools.name: scikit-downscale
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical climate downscaling library compatible with Scikit-learn
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for statistical climate downscaling that integrates with the Pangeo ecosystem and Scikit-learn, providing various correction and downscaling utilities.

tools.name: pysteps
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for short-term ensemble precipitation nowcasting
tools.detailed_description: A modular open-source library for short-term ensemble prediction systems (nowcasting) of precipitation, offering various optical flow and stochastic noise generation methods.

tools.name: ClimateDiffuse
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion models for climate downscaling
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of diffusion models specifically tailored for climate data downscaling tasks, enabling high-resolution climate projections from lower-resolution inputs.

tools.name: torch-cfd
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operator-Assisted Computational Fluid Dynamics in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library for implementing Neural Operator-assisted Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulations using PyTorch, facilitating the integration of ML surrogates into fluid dynamics workflows.

tools.name: Climate2Weather
tools.one_line_profile: Generative framework for probabilistic climate downscaling
tools.detailed_description: A generative framework designed for probabilistic, spatiotemporally coherent downscaling of climate simulations, bridging the gap between coarse climate models and local weather impacts.

tools.name: Data-driven-Precipitation-Nowcasting
tools.one_line_profile: Satellite imagery-based precipitation nowcasting model
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of a data-driven precipitation nowcasting model using satellite imagery, presented at AAAI 2025, providing tools for short-term weather prediction.

tools.name: FNO4CO2
tools.one_line_profile: Fourier Neural Operators for carbon sequestration monitoring
tools.detailed_description: A framework using Fourier Neural Operators (FNO) for learned coupled inversion in carbon sequestration monitoring and forecasting, developed by the SLIM group.

tools.name: dfno
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed Fourier Neural Operators library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for implementing Distributed Fourier Neural Operators, enabling the training of large-scale FNO models across distributed computing resources.

tools.name: PhaseNO
tools.one_line_profile: Phase Neural Operator implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Phase Neural Operator, a specialized neural operator architecture for solving partial differential equations, particularly useful in physics and climate modeling.

tools.name: HKO-7
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark model for precipitation nowcasting (ConvLSTM/TrajGRU)
tools.detailed_description: Source code for the influential 'Deep Learning for Precipitation Nowcasting' paper, providing implementations of ConvLSTM and TrajGRU models which serve as benchmarks in the field.

tools.name: metnet_pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of MetNet for weather forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch and fastai implementation of the MetNet architecture, a deep neural network for precipitation forecasting originally developed by Google Research.

tools.name: neurop_invdes
tools.one_line_profile: Neural operator surrogates for electromagnetic inverse design
tools.detailed_description: A library providing neural operator surrogates specifically for electromagnetic inverse design problems, facilitating rapid simulation and optimization in photonics.

tools.name: NUNO
tools.one_line_profile: Non-Uniform Neural Operator implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Non-Uniform Neural Operator (NUNO), designed to handle non-uniform grids in operator learning tasks for solving PDEs.

tools.name: bcsd-python
tools.one_line_profile: Bias Correction Spatial Disaggregation (BCSD) tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that utilizes CDO to apply daily climate downscaling using the Bias Correction Spatial Disaggregation (BCSD) method.

tools.name: DeepSD
tools.one_line_profile: Super-resolution for climate downscaling
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DeepSD, a deep learning-based super-resolution approach for climate downscaling, enabling high-resolution precipitation and temperature projections.

tools.name: FuXi
tools.one_line_profile: Cascade ML system for 15-day global weather forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art cascade machine learning forecasting system capable of providing 15-day global weather forecasts with high accuracy.

tools.name: AI-VarDA
tools.one_line_profile: Modular data assimilation framework for AI-based and traditional variational algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A modular data assimilation framework supporting both traditional and AI-based variational algorithms (FengWu-4DVar, VAE-Var, LoRA-EnVar). It features pluggable interfaces for forecast models, background error representations, and observation operators, facilitating research in hybrid AI-physics data assimilation.

tools.name: FuXi-DA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning data assimilation framework for satellite observations
tools.detailed_description: A generalized deep learning data assimilation framework specifically designed for assimilating satellite observations. It likely serves as the data assimilation component or extension for the FuXi weather forecasting model ecosystem.
